description: Flexible schema for multilingual or structured text content, supporting simple strings, structured objects, and arrays for multiple content entries.

oneOf.description: Structured content object for plain text.

script.description: Specifies the script of the text. If not specified, Latin script is assumed.

marks.description: Formatting marks: i = italic, b = bold, woc = words of Christ (red lettering), sc = small caps

foot.description: Optional footnote attached to the text.

type.description: Kind of footnote: stu (study, default), trn (translation), var (textual criticism variant), map (map), xrf (cross-reference).

content.description: Any valid content type (i.e., string, object, or array).

morph.description: Morphological code (i.e., Robinson or Packard format).

paragraph.description: Indicates this text is the start of a new paragraph.

break.description: Indicates this text ends with a line break.

heading.description: Any valid content type (i.e., string, object, or array).
